text: Something came up for me sorry, I cant make it today. Ill try to get in reach with you guys before the week end. Currently im building off of Ryans core code to do analysis across different time points to see evolution. I think this would be a substantial addition as opposed to just listing out top words. What I wanted to move into was capturing the data -> displaying on site, into capturing the data -> doing analysis -> displaying on site. Being able to successfully do this would get us a better grade as opposed to just displaying RAW data that we obtained. Again, sorry I cant make it today.
Guess it's just a Ken and Ryan meeting today... again
Luke and Gene, you'd better make the meeting on Monday
